text: Richard Nelson "Oz" Griebel (June 21, 1949 â€“ July 29, 2020) was an American banker, lawyer, and politician. He ran as a Republican primary candidate in the 2010 Connecticut gubernatorial election, and as an independent in the 2018 gubernatorial election. On July 21, 2020, Griebel was hit by a car while jogging in Pennsylvania. He died from problems caused by his injuries on July 29 at the age of 71. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Road accident deaths in the United States Category:lawyers from Connecticut Category:lawyers from New Jersey Category:Politicians from Connecticut Category:Businesspeople from Connecticut Category:Independent politicians in the United States Category:People from Camden, New Jersey
title: Oz Griebel
